## Implementation Complete ✅

I have successfully implemented the **Product Price Comparison Overview Page** for PriceHawk according to the specifications.

1. ✅ **Type-safe TypeScript architecture** - Full type definitions for all data models
2. ✅ **RESTful API endpoints** - Filtering, sorting, pagination, and product details
3. ✅ **9 React components** - Reusable, well-structured UI components
4. ✅ **Price comparison logic** - Accurate status calculation with 2% threshold
5. ✅ **Search & filter system** - Real-time filtering with debounced search
6. ✅ **CSV export** - Full export functionality for reporting
7. ✅ **Responsive design** - Mobile, tablet, and desktop support
8. ✅ **Professional UI** - Matches reference design with PriceHawk branding

- **5-retailer price comparison** (Thai Watsadu, HomePro, Global House, DoHome, Boonthavorn)
- **Color-coded status badges** (Green = Cheapest, Orange = Higher, Gray = Same)
- **Clickable price links** with external link icons
- **Advanced filtering** by category, brand, and search
- **Pagination** for large datasets
- **CSV export** with filtered data support
- **Thai language support** for categories and product names
